name: Puzzle Cloner
description:
For the [GameDevWeek 2021.2] Game Jam

Controlls

[ A D ] - Movement
[ Space ] - Jump
[ LM ] - Shoot Clone
[ Tab ] - Switch Between Player & Clones
[ 1 ] - Switch To Main Player
